mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_eventcomment (evc_no, ev_no, evc_pcno, evc_comment, evc_commenter) VALUES (SEQ_EVC_NO.NEXTVAL,#{ev_no}, #{evc_pcno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evc_comment}, #{evc_commenter})
mapper.select: SELECT evc_no, ev_no, NVL(evc_pcno,evc_no) as evc_pcno, evc_comment, evc_commenter, evc_cdate, evc_update FROM tb_eventcomment WHERE ev_no = #{ev_no} ORDER BY evc_pcno asc, evc_no asc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_eventcomment WHERE evc_no = #{evc_no} AND evc_commenter = #{evc_commenter}
